name: @antonycc/web-submit-diyaccounting-co-uk
description: Submit UK tax information to HMRC

scripts.build: ./mvnw clean verify && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting-fix: prettier --write . && ./mvnw spotless:apply && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting:js-fix: prettier --write . && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.formatting:java-fix: ./mvnw -DskipTests spotless:apply && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.linting-fix: eslint --fix . && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.cdk:synth-environment: cd cdk-environment && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation && cd ..
scripts.cdk:synth-application: cd cdk-application && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation && cd ..
scripts.cdk: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.cdk-ci: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.everything: time sh -c 'rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules target && ./mvnw clean && npm install && npm test && npm run docker:build && ./mvnw test && npm run test:all && npm run test:allBehaviour-proxy && npm run build && npm run cdk-ci && npm run cdk && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true && ./mvnw clean compile && npm ci && npm test'
scripts.test:all: npx vitest --run app/unit-tests/*.test.js app/unit-tests/*/*.test.js app/system-tests/*.test.js web/unit-tests/*.test.js && npm run test:browser && npm run test:submitVatBehaviour-proxy && git restore web/public/submit.deployment-name.txt web/public/submit.environment-name.txt || true
scripts.test:allBehaviour-proxy-sandbox: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- npm run test:allBehaviour
scripts.test:submitVatBehaviour-proxy-report: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npm run test:submitVatBehaviour-proxy ; npm run test-report -- --testName submitVatBehaviour --testFile ./behaviour-tests/submitVat.behaviour.test.js --envFile .env.proxy && ./scripts/publish-web-test-local.sh target/behaviour-test-results/test-report-submitVatBehaviour.json web-test-local
scripts.test:postVatReturnFraudPreventionHeaders: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npm run test:postVatReturnFraudPreventionHeadersBehaviour-proxy ; npm run test-report -- --testName postVatReturnFraudPreventionHeadersBehaviour --testFile behaviour-tests/postVatReturnFraudPreventionHeaders.behaviour.test.js --envFile .env.proxy && ./scripts/publish-web-test-local.sh target/behaviour-test-results/test-report-postVatReturnFraudPreventionHeadersBehaviour.json web-test-local
scripts.test:getVatObligationsBehaviour-proxy-re: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npm run test:getVatObligationsBehaviour-proxy ; npm run test-report -- --testName getVatObligationsBehaviour --testFile behaviour-tests/getVatObligations.behaviour.test.js --envFile .env.proxy && ./scripts/publish-web-test-local.sh target/behaviour-test-results/test-report-getVatObligationsBehaviour.json web-test-local
scripts.test:postVatReturnBehaviour-proxy-report: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npm run test:postVatReturnBehaviour-proxy ; npm run test-report -- --testName postVatReturnBehaviour --testFile ./behaviour-tests/postVatReturn.behaviour.test.js --envFile .env.proxy && ./scripts/publish-web-test-local.sh target/behaviour-test-results/test-report-postVatReturnBehaviour.json web-test-local
scripts.test:getVatReturnBehaviour-proxy-report: HMRC_ACCOUNT=sandbox npm run test:getVatReturnBehaviour-proxy ; npm run test-report -- --testName getVatReturnBehaviour --testFile ./behaviour-tests/getVatReturn.behaviour.test.js --envFile .env.proxy && ./scripts/publish-web-test-local.sh target/behaviour-test-results/test-report-getVatReturnBehaviour.json web-test-local
scripts.auth: npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- docker run -p 8080:8080 -e JSON_CONFIG_PATH=/config/mock-oauth2-config.json -e LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG -v $(pwd)/mock-oauth2-config.json:/config/mock-oauth2-config.json:ro ghcr.io/navikt/mock-oauth2-server:3.0.1
scripts.accessibility:proxy: npm run accessibility:pa11y-prod && npm run accessibility:axe-proxy
scripts.accessibility:ci: npm run accessibility:pa11y-prod && npm run accessibility:axe-ci
scripts.accessibility:prod: npm run accessibility:pa11y-prod && npm run accessibility:axe-prod
scripts.accessibility:proxy-report: npm run accessibility:pa11y-proxy-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-proxy-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-wcag22-proxy-report ; npm run accessibility:lighthouse-proxy-report
scripts.accessibility:ci-report: npm run accessibility:pa11y-ci-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-ci-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-wcag22-ci-report ; npm run accessibility:lighthouse-ci-report
scripts.accessibility:prod-report: npm run accessibility:pa11y-prod-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-prod-report ; npm run accessibility:axe-wcag22-prod-report ; npm run accessibility:lighthouse-prod-report
scripts.accessibility:pa11y-proxy-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && pa11y-ci --config .pa11yci.proxy.json --reporter cli > target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt 2>&1 || true && echo 'Report: target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt'
scripts.accessibility:pa11y-ci-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && pa11y-ci --config .pa11yci.ci.json --reporter cli > target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt 2>&1 || true && echo 'Report: target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt'
scripts.accessibility:pa11y-prod-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && pa11y-ci --config .pa11yci.prod.json --reporter cli > target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt 2>&1 || true && echo 'Report: target/accessibility/pa11y-report.txt'
scripts.accessibility:axe-ci-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && axe https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/about.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/privacy.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/terms.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/accessibility.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/auth/login.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/guide/index.html --save target/accessibility/axe-results.json || true
scripts.accessibility:axe-prod-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && axe https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/about.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/privacy.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/terms.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/accessibility.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/auth/login.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/guide/index.html --save target/accessibility/axe-results.json || true
scripts.accessibility:axe-wcag22-ci-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && axe https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/about.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/privacy.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/terms.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/accessibility.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/auth/login.html https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/guide/index.html --tags wcag2a,wcag2aa,wcag21a,wcag21aa,wcag22aa --save target/accessibility/axe-wcag22-results.json || true
scripts.accessibility:axe-wcag22-prod-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && axe https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/about.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/privacy.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/terms.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/accessibility.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/auth/login.html https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk/guide/index.html --tags wcag2a,wcag2aa,wcag21a,wcag21aa,wcag22aa --save target/accessibility/axe-wcag22-results.json || true
scripts.accessibility:lighthouse-ci-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && lighthouse https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk --chrome-flags='--headless --no-sandbox' --quiet --output json --output-path target/accessibility/lighthouse-results.json || true
scripts.accessibility:lighthouse-prod-report: mkdir -p target/accessibility && lighthouse https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk --chrome-flags='--headless --no-sandbox' --quiet --output json --output-path target/accessibility/lighthouse-results.json || true
scripts.penetration:proxy: npm run penetration:eslint && npm run penetration:audit && npm run penetration:retire && npm run penetration:zap-proxy
scripts.penetration:ci: npm run penetration:eslint && npm run penetration:audit && npm run penetration:retire && npm run penetration:zap-ci
scripts.penetration:prod: npm run penetration:eslint && npm run penetration:audit && npm run penetration:retire && npm run penetration:zap-prod
scripts.penetration:proxy-report: npm run penetration:eslint-report ; npm run penetration:audit-report ; npm run penetration:retire-report; npm run penetration:zap-proxy-report
scripts.penetration:ci-report: npm run penetration:eslint-report ; npm run penetration:audit-report ; npm run penetration:retire-report ; npm run penetration:zap-ci-report
scripts.penetration:prod-report: npm run penetration:eslint-report ; npm run penetration:audit-report ; npm run penetration:retire-report ; npm run penetration:zap-prod-report
scripts.penetration:eslint-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && eslint --config eslint.security.config.js . --format stylish 2>&1 | tee target/penetration/eslint-security.txt || true
scripts.penetration:audit-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && npm audit --json --audit-level=moderate 2>&1 > target/penetration/npm-audit.json 2>&1 || true
scripts.penetration:retire-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && retire --path . --outputformat json --outputpath target/penetration/retire.json 2>&1 || true
scripts.penetration:zap-proxy: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://wanted-finally-anteater.ngrok-free.app -j -m 2
scripts.penetration:zap-ci: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk -j -m 2
scripts.penetration:zap-prod: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk -j -m 2
scripts.penetration:zap-proxy-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://wanted-finally-anteater.ngrok-free.app -j -m 2 -r zap-report.html -J zap-report.json || true
scripts.penetration:zap-ci-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk -j -m 2 -r zap-report.html -J zap-report.json || true
scripts.penetration:zap-prod-report: mkdir -p target/penetration && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target/penetration:/zap/wrk:rw -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap-baseline.py -t https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk -j -m 2 -r zap-report.html -J zap-report.json || true
scripts.compliance:proxy: npm run accessibility:proxy && npm run penetration:proxy
scripts.compliance:ci: npm run accessibility:ci && npm run penetration:ci
scripts.compliance:prod: npm run accessibility:prod && npm run penetration:prod
scripts.compliance:proxy-report: npm run accessibility:proxy-report ; npm run penetration:proxy-report
scripts.compliance:ci-report: npm run accessibility:ci-report ; npm run penetration:ci-report
scripts.compliance:prod-report: npm run accessibility:prod-report ; npm run penetration:prod-report
scripts.compliance:ci-report-md: npm run compliance:ci-report && node scripts/generate-compliance-report.js --target https://ci.submit.diyaccounting.co.uk
scripts.compliance:prod-report-md: npm run compliance:prod-report && node scripts/generate-compliance-report.js --target https://submit.diyaccounting.co.uk
